short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display strawpoll result by right-clicking them. Currently supports strawpoll.me and strawpoll.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quick view of sorted poll result by right-clicking a poll link.

Add an item to contextual menus when right-clicking a link to either strawpoll.me or strawpoll.com poll.

Clicking on this item will display the result, sorted by most voted, in the bottom right corner of the browser.

Also for Firefox: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/strawpoll-viewer
